DOC.brief_summary: The effects of anesthetic method on cerebral oxygen saturation in geriatric patients undergoing transurethral surgery.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Anesthetic Method on Cerebral Oxygen Saturation in Geriatric Patients Undergoing Transurethral Surgery
DOC.criteria: male patients (ASA physical status I and II) aged over 65 yrs and scheduled elective transurethral surgery cardiovascular, renal, liver disease, or cerebrovascular disorder
